company.exchange: HONG KONG EXCHANGES AND CLEARING LTD
company.name: ENN Energy Holdings Ltd

title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of ENN Energy Holdings Ltd

content.text: ENN Energy Holdings Ltd is incorporated in China.
Initial Public Offering (IPO) of ENN Energy Holdings Ltd on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange (HKEX).
ENN Energy Holdings Ltd completes a 2-for-1 stock split. Shareholders receive an additional share for each share held.
The company issues bonus shares on a 10-for-1 basis. Shareholders receive 10 additional shares for each share held.
ENN Energy Holdings Ltd announces a 2-for-1 stock split. Shareholders receive an additional share for each share held.
The company completes a 2-for-1 stock split. Shareholders receive an additional share for each share held.
ENN Energy Holdings Ltd announces a 10-for-1 stock split. Shareholders will receive 10 additional shares for each share held.
The 10-for-1 stock split is completed. Shareholders receive 10 additional shares for each share held.
